definition: triathlon (Tw)/(athletics) throwing events excluding the hammer throw (i.e. discus, javelin and shot put)

sentences.english: A three iron is used to hit a golf ball a little further with a draw.
sentences.chinese: 一個三鐵是用來打高爾夫球球與平局遠一點。

definition: to be a cinch/in the bag/(of a person) confident of success
sharp ears and keen eyes (idiom)/keen and alert/perceptive
to die without a burial site/to die a pauper/a tragic end
pinyin: si3 wu2 zang4 shen1 zhi1 di4

definition: lit. to sleep on brushwood and taste gall (like King Gou Jian of Yue 勾踐|勾践[Gou1 Jian4]), in order to recall one's humiliations) (idiom)/fig. to maintain one's resolve for revenge
feng shui master/geomancer/stock figure in folk tales, as a wise adviser or a charlatan
lit. the river that divides Chu and Han/fig. a line that divides rival territories/the mid-line between sides on a Chinese chessboard
